label: 侍所
本: State of War: the Violent Order of Fourteenth Century Japan . Michigan University Press . 2003
説明文: Administrative organ of the Muromachi regime which was dominated by Ashikaga Takauji and his chief of staff (shitsuji), and was primarily responsible for overseeing affairs of the shōgun's direct retainers. Most of this organ's powers were supplanted by the kanrei. [足利尊氏、執事、管領]
